org.apache.pig

Interface LoadPredicatePushdown

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OrcStorage

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
@InterfaceStability.Evolving
public interface LoadPredicatePushdown
    This interface defines how a loader can support predicate pushdown. If a given loader implements this interface, pig will pushdown predicates based on type of operations supported by the loader on given set of fields. This interface is private in Pig 0.14 and will be made public in Pig 0.15 after PIG-4093. It is to be used only by builtin LoadFunc implementations till it is made public as PIG-4093 will cause API changes to this interface and make it backward incompatible.
    Since:
    Pig 0.14

    • Method Detail

      • getPredicateFields

        List<String> getPredicateFields(String location,
                              org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Job job)
                                throws IOException
        Find what fields of the data can support predicate pushdown.
        Parameters:
        location - Location as returned by LoadFunc.relativeToAbsolutePath(String, org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path)
        job - The Job object - this should be used only to obtain cluster properties through JobContextImpl.getConfiguration() and not to set/query any runtime job information.
        Returns:
        list of field names that can be pushed down. Implementations should return null to indicate that there are no fields that support predicate pushdown
        Throws:
        IOException - if an exception occurs while retrieving predicate fields

      • getSupportedExpressionTypes

        List<Expression.OpType> getSupportedExpressionTypes()
        Indicate operations on fields supported by the loader for predicate pushdown
        Returns:
        List of operations supported by the predicate pushdown loader

      • setPushdownPredicate

        void setPushdownPredicate(Expression predicate)
                          throws IOException
        Push down expression to the loader
        Parameters:
        predicate - expression to be filtered by the loader.
        Throws:
        IOException
